exceptions.exn: In environment n : nat a : nat -> R n' : nat The term "n" has type "nat" while it is expected to have type "nat -> R".
In environment n : nat a : nat -> R n' : nat Unable to unify "CV_radius (PS_derive ?M2366) = CV_radius ?M2366" with "INR (fact (n' + n)) / INR (fact n') * a (n' + n)%nat = a n'".
In environment n : nat a : nat -> R n' : nat Unable to unify "CV_radius (PS_scal_r ?M2366 ?M2367) = CV_radius ?M2367" with "INR (fact (n' + n)) / INR (fact n') * a (n' + n)%nat = a n'".

original: unfold CV_radius. apply CV_radius_ext. intros n. unfold PS_derive_n. apply eq_trans with (PS_derive n a). apply CV_radius_derive. apply CV_radius_scal_r. auto.
